title: STAT+: Oz, other officials meet with key senators to push Trump’s ideas for lower drug prices
description: Trump wants lawmakers to force pharma companies to lower their prices, but it's not clear the GOP is on board.
content: Trump wants lawmakers to force pharma companies to lower their prices, but it's not clear the GOP is on board.
